advisory: Nursery Management - Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply FYM, DAP, MOP, and Zinc sulphate during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length. Irrigation channels should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Sprouted Seeds should be sown with appropriate spacing.
Seed treatment - Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P or Carboxin before sowing in the nursery.
Yellow mosaic virus - Control by spraying triazophos or Acetamipride per acre.

Wilting - Spray Mancozeb 75% WP if symptoms are noticed.
Fruit & Shoot borer - Install pheromone trap to monitor pest population.
To manage Alternaria leaf spot disease, spray Mancozeb or carbendazim per acre.
Aphids and Jassids infestation - To manage, spray Imidachloprid per litre.
Leaf eating caterpillar - Use Pheromone trap or chemical control.
